name: Cable
description: A Cable represents a Physics Constraint which joins two Actors with a rope-like visual representation between them.

parameters.name: enable_visuals
parameters.description: Toggles the cable visuals

functions.name: AttachStartTo
functions.description: Attached the beginning of this cable to another Actor at a specific bone or relative location

functions.name: AttachEndTo
functions.description: Attached the end of this cable to another Actor at a specific bone or relative location

functions.name: DetachEnd
functions.description: Detaches the End of this Cable

functions.name: DetachStart
functions.description: Detaches the Start of this Cable

functions.name: SetCableSettings
functions.description: Set the overall settings for this cable (visuals only)

parameters.name: length
parameters.description: Rest length of the cable. Default is 100

parameters.name: num_segments
parameters.description: How many segments the cable has. Default is 10

parameters.name: solver_iterations
parameters.description: The number of solver iterations controls how 'stiff' the cable is. Default is 0

functions.name: SetForces
functions.description: Set the forces the cable has applied (visuals only)

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: Force vector (world space) applied to all particles in cable. Default is Vector(0, 0, 0)

parameters.name: gravity_scale
parameters.description: Scaling applied to world gravity affecting this cable. Default is 1

functions.name: SetAngularLimits
functions.description: Sets the Physics Angular Limits of this cable

parameters.name: swing_1_motion
parameters.description: Indicates whether the Swing1 limit is used

parameters.name: swing_2_motion
parameters.description: Indicates whether the Swing2 limit is used

parameters.name: twist_motion
parameters.description: Indicates whether the Twist limit is used

parameters.name: swing_1_limit
parameters.description: Angle of movement along the XY plane. This defines the first symmetric angle of the cone

parameters.name: swing_2_limit
parameters.description: Angle of movement along the XZ plane. This defines the second symmetric angle of the cone

parameters.name: twist_limit
parameters.description: Symmetric angle of roll along the X-axis

functions.name: SetLinearLimits
functions.description: Sets the Physics Linear Limits of this cable
functions.description_long: Sets the Physics Linear Limits of this cable. If use_soft_constraint is enabled, then stiffness and damping will be used, otherwise restitution will be used.

parameters.name: x_motion
parameters.description: Indicates the linear constraint applied along the X-axis. Free implies no constraint at all. Locked implies no movement along X is allowed. Limited implies the distance in the joint along all active axes must be less than the Distance provided

parameters.name: y_motion
parameters.description: Indicates the linear constraint applied along the Y-axis. Free implies no constraint at all. Locked implies no movement along Y is allowed. Limited implies the distance in the joint along all active axes must be less than the Distance provided

parameters.name: z_motion
parameters.description: Indicates the linear constraint applied along theZX-axis. Free implies no constraint at all. Locked implies no movement along Z is allowed. Limited implies the distance in the joint along all active axes must be less than the Distance provided

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The distance allowed between between the two joint reference frames. Distance applies on all axes enabled (one axis means line, two axes implies circle, three axes implies sphere)

parameters.name: restitution
parameters.description: Controls the amount of bounce when the constraint is violated. A restitution value of 1 will bounce back with the same velocity the limit was hit. A value of 0 will stop dead

parameters.name: use_soft_constraint
parameters.description: Whether we want to use a soft constraint (spring)

parameters.name: stiffness
parameters.description: Stiffness of the soft constraint. Only used when Soft Constraint is on

parameters.name: damping
parameters.description: Damping of the soft constraint. Only used when Soft Constraint is on

functions.name: SetRenderingSettings
functions.description: Set the rendering settings of this cable (visuals only)

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: How wide the cable geometry is. Default is 6

parameters.name: num_sides
parameters.description: Number of sides of the cable geometry. Default is 4

parameters.name: tile_material
parameters.description: How many times to repeat the material along the length of the cable. Default is 1

functions.name: GetAttachedStartTo
functions.description: Gets the Actor attached to Start

functions.name: GetAttachedEndTo
functions.description: Gets the Actor attached to End
